entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
